oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Sorcerers shoot with invisible arrows, causing illness. The sick man. The aid of the old women to be sought. By /han≠kass’o (L VIII.
7295). The wounded person feels pain and weariness. The old women 'snore' sick people and remove what ails them. Once 'snored' the person will again feel comfortable.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Sorcerers shoot with invisible arrows, causing illness
